# DropClaimConditions class

Manages claim conditions for NFT Drop contracts

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class DropClaimConditions<TContract extends PrebuiltNFTDrop | PrebuiltTokenDrop | BaseClaimConditionERC721 | BaseDropERC20>
```

| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [(constructor)(contractWrapper, metadata, storage)](./sdk.dropclaimconditions._constructor_.md) |           | Constructs a new instance of the <code>DropClaimConditions</code> class |

| [getClaimerProofs(claimerAddress, claimConditionId)](./sdk.dropclaimconditions.getclaimerproofs.md)                  |           | Returns allow list information and merkle proofs for the given address.                                                                                                                                               |
| [getClaimIneligibilityReasons(quantity, addressToCheck)](./sdk.dropclaimconditions.getclaimineligibilityreasons.md)  |           | For any claim conditions that a particular wallet is violating, this function returns human readable information about the breaks in the condition that can be used to inform the user.                               |
| [getClaimTransaction(destinationAddress, quantity, options)](./sdk.dropclaimconditions.getclaimtransaction.md)       |           | Construct a claim transaction without executing it. This is useful for estimating the gas cost of a claim transaction, overriding transaction options and having fine grained control over the transaction execution. |
